MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG6 postcode area of Kirkcudbright. It is neccessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:25pm following reports of a grounded overhead cable near to Culcagrie and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:25 PM on Friday, 02 April 2021.
